item.title: AMERICAN CHURCH MORTGAGE CO 10-K
item.description: AMERICAN CHURCH MORTGAGE CO, which is in the Real Estate [6500] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 31, 2021 had 17927 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: loans - 214 instances mortgage - 205 instances loan - 190 instances company - 180 instances 31 - 161 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
